definition: Brigitte Lin (1954-), Taiwanese actress
surname Lin/Japanese surname Hayashi
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
green/blue/black/youth/young (of people)
rose-tinted sky or clouds at sunrise or sunset

sentences.english: Bridgitte Lin Ching Hsia is a veteran actress.
sentences.chinese: 林青霞是个银幕表演经验丰富的演员。

sentences.english: Akik The first movie that you worked on with Brigitte was The Bride with White Hair.
sentences.chinese: 你和林青霞合作的第一部电影是《白发魔女传》。

sentences.english: He also has girlfriends like Teresa Teng, Brigitte Lin and Catherina Yim.
sentences.chinese: 他也有邓丽君，林青霞和米雪这样的女朋友。
